entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Carman

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
